summary: This document is a Twitter conversation from July 2020. One user expresses relief at never having been photographed with Ghislaine Maxwell, while another replies that Maxwell attended a Kleiner Perkins holiday party in 2011, and that attendees knew about her alleged role in supplying underage girls for sex.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the Twitter conversation; one user is thankful to have never been photographed with her, and another alleges she attended a Kleiner Perkins party and was known for supplying underage girls for sex.

persons.name: Cyan
persons.context: Twitter user (@cyantist) who posted the original tweet expressing relief at never having been invited to parties where Ghislaine Maxwell was present.

persons.name: Ekp
persons.context: Twitter user who replied to the original tweet, stating that Ghislaine Maxwell was at the Kleiner Perkins holiday party in 2011 and that attendees knew about her alleged activities.

connections.description: Ekp claims to have been at the same 2011 Kleiner Perkins holiday party that Ghislaine Maxwell attended.

events.title: Kleiner Perkins Holiday Party
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell attended the Kleiner Perkins holiday party in 2011, according to a Twitter user's recollection.

keyFacts: A Twitter user alleges Ghislaine Maxwell attended the Kleiner Perkins holiday party in 2011.
The same user claims that attendees at the party knew about Maxwell's alleged role in 'supplying underage girls for sex.'
The conversation reflects public awareness and discussion of Maxwell's alleged activities years before her arrest.
